seo.title: The Brand Scaling Bootcamp - Ahmed Damouni
seo.description: The client-getting system that nobody was meant to leak. Free training + cheat sheet to plug into your Meta + GHL system.

hero.title: The client getting system that nobody was meant to leak
hero.subtitle: The Secret [[Black Box]] Behind Profitable Meta Ads
hero.belowVideo: For [[Operators]] or [[Founders]] who are tired of feast-or-famine [[clients]].

trade.title: How Long Are You Going to Let Broken Marketing Decide Your Income?
trade.subtitle: Be honest with yourself for a second.
bullets: The [[lucky]] month where your ads somehow [[work...]] followed by two months of crickets.
The agency that sends screenshots and buzzwords but [[not buyers]] in your Stripe.
The campaigns that get clicks, likes, and comments but almost [[no booked calls.]]
The feeling that you're smart enough to fix this, but you [[don't know]] what to [[change.]]
The quiet panic every time you check Ads Manager and see [[money]] going [[out, not]] coming [[back.]]
trade.bottomStrong: [[You're not crazy for wanting predictable clients and cashflow.]]
trade.bottom: You've just never been shown a [[simple system]] that makes Meta ads [[work]] for you, not against you.

brandScaling.title: Only [[3%]] of your market wakes up [[ready to buy]]
paragraphs: If you [[don't have a system]] for the other [[97%]], you're lighting your advertising [[budget on fire]].
Because here's what actually happens:
The 3% who are ready to buy now will click, compare you to 3 other tabs, and choose whoever feels the most dialed-in.
The next 40% are interested but distracted - they need follow-up, reminders, and proof before they move.
The remaining 57% don't even know they have a problem yet - until your content and ads make it painfully obvious.
brandScaling.footer: They should push all three groups into one simple GHL system that captures them, follows up with them, and turns them into booked calls while you work - or sleep.

rock.title:
Follow Along as I Build
 a Profit Machine From Scratch
kickers: I'm building this Meta ads system the same way you'd have to
zeroList: No warm audience or secret email list
No agency team doing the work for me
No giant budget to hide bad decisions
rock.highlight: And I'm documenting everything as I turn cold traffic into booked calls using Meta + GHL.
insideItems: The exact ad setup I use to go from testing to profitable scaling
How I turn new leads into conversations and clients using simple automations
The real numbers, wins, and flops so you can copy what works and avoid what doesn't

cards.label: WHAT
cards.text: A free on-demand training + Meta Ads Psychology Cheat Sheet that shows you how to turn cold traffic into booked calls using a simple Meta + GHL system. Watch the short VSL, follow the steps, and keep the cheat sheet open as you build.

cards.label: WHERE
cards.text: 100% online. You'll get instant access to the video and a downloadable PDF you can reuse every time you launch or fix a campaign.

cards.label: WHEN
cards.text: Right now. Enter your email, hit play, and start installing the system in the next 30 minutes - no live webinar, no wait, no timezone drama.

learn.heading: What You'll Learn in the Training

titleLines: Part 1: The Psychology That Makes Meta Ads Work
rows.desc: Learn why understanding your buyer beats copying "winning" ads.
bullets: Why most freelancers and agencies only speak to the 3% ready to buy now
How to map your buyer's fears, goals, and objections before you write a single line of copy
How to position your offer so it feels "made for them," even in a crowded niche

titleLines: Part 2: Psychology Into a Simple Meta + GHL System
rows.desc: See the full system you'll copy from the training and cheat sheet.
bullets: The exact campaign structure to turn cold traffic into booked calls
The GHL automations that follow up, nurture, and close while you're off the laptop
How to scale spend without breaking your funnel or burning your audience

titleLines: Part 3: Running Ads That Actually Turn Into Money
rows.desc: Understand how to set up profitable Meta campaigns and know exactly what to fix when they tank.
bullets: The campaign setup I use so every dollar has a job
How to read your numbers in Ads Manager without getting overwhelmed
The simple tweaks that turn "nice" campaigns into ones that print buyers

titleLines: Part 4: Building the Follow-Up System Around Your Ads
rows.desc: Transform random leads into a steady flow of clients using GHL.
bullets: The pipeline and automations that take new leads from click to conversation to client
How to stop being the bottleneck by letting the system chase, remind, and nurture for you
The exact follow-up rhythm that works for both hungry freelancers and busy agency owners

titleLines: Part 5: Scaling Without Burning Out or Burning Your Audience
rows.desc: Fast-track what's working instead of restarting from scratch every month.
bullets: How to safely scale spend without wrecking your cost per lead
When to duplicate, when to kill, and when to just let Meta cook
How this system becomes an asset you can plug into any offer you launch next

Full audit of your offer, ads, targeting, and follow-up flows
A custom action plan to fix leaks and turn your traffic into booked calls

guarantee.title: My This Won't Waste Your Time Promise
paragraphs: If you watch the training and go through the cheat sheet and still feel like you have no clearer path to fixing your ads, you owe me nothing.
If you book the 1:1 audit and, by the end of the call, you don't feel like you know exactly what to do next, I'll refund the 197, no questions asked.
Just reply to your confirmation email within 7 days and say refund please, you'll have your money back within 24 hours.
I can make this promise because I know the game you're playing and I've seen what happens when people finally install a real system.
If you show up and do the work, results stop being a mystery and start being math.
You handle the showing up. I'll handle the rest.

why.title: "Why Is This Free?"
paragraphs: Fair question.
I've seen people charge 500+ for less than what you're getting in this training and cheat sheet.
Here's my logic:
I'm not trying to get rich off a PDF.
I'm trying to find the freelancers and operators who are serious about fixing their client-getting machine.
Some of you will use the free training, get results, and never pay me a cent but you'll remember who helped you.
Some of you will want help installing or scaling the system and book the 1:1 audit or a bigger package.
Both outcomes are wins for me.
Giving this away filters out the people who aren't serious and lets me overdeliver for the ones who are.
So take the free training, steal the system, and if you want my hands on your business after, you'll know where to find me.

limited.title: This Won't Be Free Forever
limited.lead: Access to the free training may close once we hit our max number of users I can realistically support.

cards.text: If you're still stuck in feast-or-famine six months from now, it won't be because this didn't exist - it'll be because you scrolled past it.
The 1:1 Meta Ads & Funnel Audit stays at 197 for now - but once the calendar is full, the price goes up.
Giveaway entries for the GHL year, live intensive, and traffic booster are only valid for people who grab the training during this round.

footer: Last time I opened this up, over 300,000 people hit the funnel in a month and my calendar was slammed with multiple audits a day.
I refuse to turn this into another factory where we rush through calls and skim over your numbers.
So now we run this in controlled waves. We turn the funnel on, let a limited batch in, do the work properly, then turn it off again until we're ready for the next round.
If you're seeing this, it means the doors are open - for now.

host.heading: Meet Your Host
intro: A few years ago, I was in the same loop you're in now.
Good at what I do, smart enough to figure things out, but still stuck in:
stuckBullets: Letting cheap agencies guess with my money
host.pivot: What finally clicked wasn't some secret hack. It was realizing this game is actually simple if you care enough to own it yourself:
systemBullets: Know your buyer better than anyone else
Do basic math on what you can pay to get one
Plug it all into a system that follows up for you
outro: That's it. No "media buying wizard," no 20-person agency.
You already know your customers better than any $1K-a-month agency ever will.
All you're missing is a clear way to turn that knowledge into ads and a funnel that bring buyers in every day.
This training and cheat sheet are built to give you exactly that - without fluff, without jargon, and without pretending this is harder than it really is.

items.q: I have no experience. Can I still do this?
items.a: That's literally the point. The bootcamp is designed to walk complete beginners through the exact steps - live - so you can copy what I'm doing and start signing clients.

items.q: How much time do I need to commit?
items.a: Each session is 60-90 minutes, plus optional Q&A / VIP breakouts. You can watch live or catch the replays.

items.q: What if I can't make it live?
items.a: You'll get access to the replays so you can watch on your own schedule.

items.q: Will this work in my country?
items.a: Yep. The model works worldwide - we have students from the US, Serbia, the UK, Canada, and more.
